bibl.title: Late Roman Egyptian Amphorae from Squares U and V at Kom el-Nana. With an Appendix by Barry KEMP.
bibl.note: L'amphore "M3" (= Late Roman 7): fonction, enduits internes, perforation, contenus, remplois, capacité, typologie, poids, etc.

bibl.title: Jane FAIERS, with contributions by Sarah CLACKSON, Barry KEMP, Gillian PYKE and Richard REECE, Late Roman Pottery at Amarna and Related Studies

bibl.seg: PYKE Gillian, Late Roman Egyptian Amphorae from Squares U and V at Kom el-Nana. With an Appendix by Barry KEMP.

Jane FAIERS, with contributions by Sarah CLACKSON, Barry KEMP, Gillian PYKE and Richard REECE, Late Roman Pottery at Amarna and Related Studies = Egypt Exploration Society. Excavation Memoirs. 72 (London, 2005) pp. 213-343.
L'amphore "M3" (= Late Roman 7): fonction, enduits internes, perforation, contenus, remplois, capacité, typologie, poids, etc.
